---

**Title:** Architectural and Engineering Services - RAFF M50
**Reference Number:** WS3586337566-Doc3589750782
**Amendment Number:** 5

**Publication Date:** November 7, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** December 12, 2022 at 2:00 PM EST
**Amendment Date:** December 8, 2022

**Government Activity:** The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a consulting firm, or joint venture, to provide architectural and engineering services for the modernization of laboratory facilities on behalf of the National Research Council Canada.

**Services Required:** The selected firm will provide architectural and engineering services to modernize laboratory facilities, including design, planning, and construction management.

**Eligibility:** Firms must comply with the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and other applicable trade agreements.

**Submission Requirements:** All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by December 12, 2022, at 2:00 PM EST. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.

**Contract Details:**

* **Contract Start Date:** December 19, 2022
* **Contract End Date:** To be determined
* **Regions of Delivery:** Ottawa, Ontario

**Contact Information:**

* **Name:** Anja Ramenason (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** [anja.ramenason@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:anja.ramenason@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13895552
